Prompt.pre_question_prompt: I am an expert in suggesting the name of the song depending on your mood right now. I will ask some questions to collect information and then I will use the information to suggest name of the song.
Prompt.task_specific_prompt: Suggest a name of the song using the questions and answers above.

QApair.Question: What kind of mood are you in right now?
QApair.Answer: I am feeling happy and content.

QApair.Question: What are you doing right now?
QApair.Answer: I am spending time with my family.

QApair.Question: What are your plans for the future?
QApair.Answer: I am planning to go back to school and get my degree.

QApair.Question: What are your thoughts on love?
QApair.Answer: I believe that love is the most important thing in life.

QApair.Question: What is your favorite color?
QApair.Answer: My favorite color is green.

QApair.Question: What is your favorite season?
QApair.Answer: My favorite season is summer.

QApair.Question: What is your favorite food?
QApair.Answer: My favorite food is sushi.

QApair.Question: What is your favorite hobby?
QApair.Answer: My favorite hobby is reading.

QApair.Question: What is your favorite place to visit?
QApair.Answer: My favorite place to visit is the beach.

QApair.Question: What is your favorite type of music?
QApair.Answer: My favorite type of music is country

Instances.Output: The song that I would suggest is Here Comes the Sun by The Beatles.
